title: OnePlus 5 review | Trusted Reviews
description: ## Sections  * Page 1 OnePlus 5  * Page 2 [Performance and Software]()  **  I would have liked to see a resolution bump, but in all honestly it’s tough topick out individual pixels unless you get really close. It’s not as sharp asthe [HTC U11](https://www.trustedreviews.com/htc-u11-review), nor is it assharp as a 5-inch 1080p device, but colours are nice and because it’s AMOLEDthere’s that extra depth to blacks that you don’t get with LCD.Gorilla Glass 5 covers the panel and that should help prevent scratches, but Ihave still found small hairline scratches appear on the display after a weekof use.[ Next  Performance and Software](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/oneplus-5-performance-and-software-page-2)
